Goibibo Spending Tracker: Keep Your Travel Expenses in Check

Stay on top of your Goibibo spending with the Goibibo Spending Tracker! This easy-to-use extension helps you track how much you’re spending on flights, hotels, and more, giving you a clear view of your travel budget.

Key Features:

Total Spent on Goibibo: See exactly how much you’ve spent across all your Goibibo bookings.
Flight & Hotel Breakdown: Get a quick look at how much you’ve spent on flights and hotels.
Spending Over Time: Check your spending for the past:
1 Month
6 Months
1 Year
Why You’ll Love It:

Track all your Goibibo purchases in one place.
Easily see how much you’re spending on flights and hotels.
Review your spending over different time periods to spot trends.
Keep your travel budget in check and make smarter decisions.
